    IBubbleManager
    Write a description of interface IBubbleManager here.
    IDisplayObject
    The IDisplayObject instance contains all the data for displaying something by an IWorld instance.
    IInput
    IInput implementations access input from Env3D.
    IInputListener
    IInputListener: all listeners for input must implement this interface.
    IInputPublisher
    IInputPublisher: publishes input events to all listeners.
    IMovement
    The IMovement instance provides functionality to allow objects to receive x and y cords for various movement patterns, receive notification if the fish hits a boundry and update the movement class with the x and y location of the method caller.

    IUpdatable
    Any object that needs to be updated in an update loop should implement IUpdatable.

    Write a description of interface IUpdatableFactory here.
    IWorld
    IWorld implementations provide the virtual world functionality for the simulation.

    MouseHandler

    WorldDoesNotExistException
    The WorldDoesNotExistException class: an instance is thrown when someone tries to do something to a non-existent Env3D world.
